posts.post_content:
[Tar pitcher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tar pitcher) that without a goblin requirement and with mana in the activation cost? Could have its uses. Maybe sacrificing a [Goblin Arsonist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Arsonist) or [Reassembling Skeleton](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reassembling Skeleton)?
  
Also, the whole art is awesome. The spilled, fire-like blood, the hot cultist and the gothic architecture in the background all work well to build a tridimensional effect.
posts.html:

Also, the whole art is awesome. The spilled, fire-like blood, the hot cultist and the gothic architecture in the background all work well to build a tridimensional effect.

Posted By: Lash_of_Dragonbreath (9/25/2011 5:06:39 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: With lots and lots of "when this (or any) creature dies" effects of late, I really like her. She also fuels [Grim Lavamancer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grim Lavamancer), for a nice alternative to a straight-up burn deck. I run two of her in my R/G aggro deck, with [Goblin Arsonist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Arsonist) and lots of little token makers. Chump-block with a token creature, then sac it pre-damage to deal 2 to whatever you like. She's a utility uncommon, the grease on the wheels of a lot of decks. You don't build around her, but she plugs some holes for you. 4/5.
posts.html:
With lots and lots of "when this (or any) creature dies" effects of late, I really like her. She also fuels Grim Lavamancer, for a nice alternative to a straight-up burn deck. I run two of her in my R/G aggro deck, with Goblin Arsonist and lots of little token makers. Chump-block with a token creature, then sac it pre-damage to deal 2 to whatever you like. She's a utility uncommon, the grease on the wheels of a lot of decks. You don't build around her, but she plugs some holes for you. 4/5.

Posted By: Kryptnyt (10/18/2011 8:00:43 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
In Standard, I can easily see this being played very well. As everyone has said, having her plus anything with Morbid or Bloodthirst makes her extremely useful.  
  
Unfortunately, she is one of the worst uncommons to pull during a draft. Her cost is usually too high, and rarely can you put together a good way to utilize her abilities to the fullest.   
  
I'm giving her a 3.5/5, because she's a 4/5 for standard, but a 2.5-3/5 in draft.
posts.html:
In Standard, I can easily see this being played very well. As everyone has said, having her plus anything with Morbid or Bloodthirst makes her extremely useful.

Unfortunately, she is one of the worst uncommons to pull during a draft. Her cost is usually too high, and rarely can you put together a good way to utilize her abilities to the fullest.

I'm giving her a 3.5/5, because she's a 4/5 for standard, but a 2.5-3/5 in draft.
